Description

Lucky Token aims to work on Web3 technologies and offer alternative platforms to its users... Crypto Lottery, Crypto Wallet, Crypto Swap (DEX) We focused on 3 main projects and our first project, Crypto Lottery, is now ready for use. Users can purchase tickets and win prizes in the pool by connecting with a metamask wallet. Search for luckytokenlottery.com and buy tickets by logging into the browser section of your metamask wallet
